New Records: Shohei Ohtani became Major League Baseball's first member of the 50-50 club.
Shohei Ohtani raised his season run total to 128, surpassing Ichiro Suzuki's previous single-season high by a Japanese player.
Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani led off the bottom of the ninth inning with a tying home run.
Mookie Betts hit a walk-off homer in the Los Angeles Dodgers' 6-5 victory over the Colorado Rockies.
Ohtani went 4-for-5 with an RBI and two stolen bases.
The Dodgers scored three runs in the seventh inning to pull within 5-4 before back-to-back ninth-inning home runs by Ohtani and Betts.
